entry.sentence: The air was cool , perhaps not far from freezing , as is still often the case in March , but of delicious freshness and purity .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (DT The) (NN air)) (VP (VBD was) (ADJP (JJ cool)) (, ,) (PP (RB perhaps) (RB not) (PP (RB far) (IN from) (NP (NP (NN freezing)) (, ,) (SBAR (IN as) (S (VP (VBZ is) (ADVP (RB still)) (ADVP (RB often) (NP (DT the) (NN case)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NNP March))))))))) (, ,) (CC but) (PP (IN of) (NP (ADJP (JJ delicious)) (NN freshness) (CC and) (NN purity))))) (. .)))
